infoText: Enter the address of the house that you would like to see reviews for
helpText: Tip! Start with the house number/name, road and then postcode for the most accurate results!
loginAlert: You need to be logged in to post a review
addressBoxErrorText: Oops! The address entered has either been entered incorrectly or is not available on our public database. Please try again or contact the support team at
enterAddress: You need to enter an address. When you do it will pop up in here.
generalFeedbackInfo: The title and body of the review
agentInfo: How did they rate the landlord?
logisticsInfo: Moving in, moving out, price, bills
reviewVerify: Are you sure that you want to submit this review?
reviewVerifyInfo: You can still change your review by clicking the back button above!
reviewVerifyWarning: Reviews cannot be modified once they have been submitted...
